title: Windermere Stripe
description: Larsen Design after Wm. Morris.Vertical floral stripes (4.75\" w) separated by 2.76\" w stripes of small buds.   10.5\" vert. Rpt. & 7\" half drop horiz. Rpt. Larsen Design after Wm.
